# Toolkit: Introductory chapters

Holding place for chapters outlined on the MIRO board.

Chapters include:

-   Executive summary

-   Overview of toolkit use cases

-   Project management considerations

-   Site OR Area-based conservation measures, general considerations

-   Data required for IBAs / KBAs (in the context of Toolkit)

-   Site types for seabirds explained

-   Methods summary

-   Conservation / Advocacy summary

-   Techincal: suggested skills required, links to resources for learning

-   dataGroups: General defition to possibly be applied to all applications

-   Colony sites: code and steps to identify IBAs / KBAs for colonies
